common.businessAppSubtext: For Business Owner and Store Agent

errorScreen.title: Something went wrong!
errorScreen.friendlySubtitle: This is the screen that your users will see in production when an error is thrown. You'll want to customize this message (located in `app/i18n/en.json`) and probably the layout as well (`app/screens/error`). If you want to remove this entirely, check `app/app.tsx` for the <ErrorBoundary> component.

order.pleaseSelect: Please select if you have any of the following condition ?
order.scheduleReqSuccessSubtext: Booking confirmed and the slot has been scheduled on requested time.
order.scheduleReqFaiureSubtext: Booking has not been confirmed on requested time. Please try scheduling on some other time
order.agentToScanTheBelowQRToCheckin: Agent to scan the below QR to checkin
order.showTheQRCodeForEasyCheckin: Show the QR Code for easy check in

gate.quantaGateSubtext: Simplify your parking billing process with Quanta gate POS App-the reliable choice for Parking agencies
gate.footerContent: Get paid faster and easier with Quanta gate's parking app

secondScreen.subText: A powerful and easy to use android POS billing machine app that helps the agents to generate bills quickly and accurately

thirdScreen.cloudStorageSubtext: Cloud storage offers data backup, remote access, scalability, disaster recovery and enhanced security measures such as encryption and authentication to protect data from unauthorized access and malicious attacks.
thirdScreen.analysisDataSubtext: By analyzing data, businesses and organizations can gain a deeper understanding of their operations, identify areas for improvement, and make more informed decisions.
thirdScreen.shareSheetsSubtext: It generate reports and share them in various formats, such as PDF, Excel, and Word. This allows users to quickly and easily share important information with others,such as parking Vehicles counts,Vehicle details,Billing details,etc…

fourthScreen.featuresSubtext: Quanta gate is designed with a range of security features to ensure the safety and privacy of your data.The app uses encryption and other security measures to ensure that your data is safe and secure.
fourthScreen.benefitsSubtext: Quanta gate provides a range of benefits to the Agents, such as faster and more accurate billing, easy data storage, and a clear status required.The app also offers a simple and intuitive user interface that makes it easy to use.
fourthScreen.securitySubtext: Quanta gate is designed with a range of security features to ensure the safety and privacy of your data.The app uses encryption and other security measures to ensure that your data is safe and secure.

fifthScreen.easeOfUseSubtext: Without any effort, save a ton of time

sixthScreen.howItWorkSubtext: Get your parking billing under control with Quanta gate's innovative app
sixthScreen.entrySubtext: Enter vehicles details and press enter
sixthScreen.processingSubtext: A QR Code copy generated containing informations of Vehicle data,time,place, Agent details etc..
sixthScreen.exitSubtext: Scan QR code using app a perfect Bill amount generated by automatic calculation.

seventhScreen.Heading: Revolutionize your parking management
seventhScreen.subText: the innovative technologies providing solutions in the parking industry.

eighthScreen.cardText1: I have been using the Quanta gate app for a few months now and I am extremely pleased with its performance. It has made managing my parking lot so much easier. The billing process is seamless and I can easily track all transactions in real-time.
eighthScreen.cardText2: I recently started using the Quanta gate app and I am very impressed with its features. The app is very user-friendly and the billing process is very easy to navigate.I would highly recommend Quanta gate to other Users.
eighthScreen.cardText3: I have been using Quanta gate for my Parking buisness and it has been a great experience so far. The app is very easy to use and has helped me to keep track of my parking in a much more efficient way.
eighthScreen.cardText4: I've been using the Quanta gate app for a while now and I couldn't be happier. The data storage and retrieval system is top-notch, and the ability to generate reports in different formats is a huge plus.
eighthScreen.cardText5: Quanta gate has made managing my parking lot a breeze. The data storage and retrieval system is top-notch, and the ability to generate reports in different formats is a huge plus. I highly recommend it.
eighthScreen.cardText6: Quanta gate is a game-changer for my parking operations.I highly recommend Quanta gate to any Parking agents looking to streamline their parking operations.

ninethScreen.delightfullySimpleAndPowerfulPosApplicat: Delightfully simple and powerful POS application
ninethScreen.subText: Join thousand users and teams in the community
